RemoteAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP range in x.x.x.x/x notation
RemoteAccessCIDR.Description: The CIDR IP range that is permitted to access Jedi stack openpose instances.

ArtifactBucket.Description: S3 bucket containing the templates and other artifacts to deploy the stack. It can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

ArtifactKeyPrefix.Description: S3 object key prefix. It can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, hyphens (-), and forward slash (/).

CollectionName.Description: Name of Rekognition Collection created to store faceIds. This collection should exist prior to launching this template

Assertions.AssertDescription: This template uses Amazon Rekognition which is only available in the US East (N. Virginia), US West (Oregon) and EU (Ireland) regions. Please launch the stack in one of these regions
